item.title: Privacy Policy
item.description: ShapeApp Welcome to privacy policy. These are not usual blah blah, everything that you read below are crisp and to the point. When you use our services we respect your privacy and data security. None of your data is collected or distributed by any of our server and scripts. Whatever information that we collect are stored in your own spaces in Google Drive. Something that we ask and why.

item.title: About
item.description: About Me I’m Japanese and scientist with Ph.D. in Physics. My curiosity is to quest, think and create. Especially, I always like to create new things which are not exist in this world yet. Basically I find such new things during sleep. I had performed most of my large discoveries during sleep. In fact, I had discovered new materials, structures, methods, designs and etc during sleep so far. Although new discovery during sleep depends on my mental and physical states, I had produced various new things for the real world so far.

item.title: Contact
item.description:
If you want to contact me, feel free to send an email.
Collaborative research with me?
